title: Cognitive Activity Integration
summary: As a developer, I want to integrate cognitive activity applications using the provided API so that I can offer elderly users personalized mental exercises that enhance their cognitive health.

title: Physical Activity Challenge Management
summary: As a developer, I want access to an API that allows me to create and manage physical activity challenges so that I can encourage elderly users to engage in regular exercise tailored to their capabilities.

title: Adaptive Difficulty Settings
summary: As a developer, I want to implement adaptive difficulty settings in cognitive and physical activities so that users can engage in challenges that are suitable for their varying abilities.

title: Gamification Integration
summary: As a developer, I want to integrate gamification features into ALFRED so that I can enhance user engagement through rewards and badges for physical and cognitive activities.

title: Progress Tracking API
summary: As a developer, I want to access an API that allows me to track and visualize users' progress in cognitive and physical activities so that I can help users stay motivated and engaged in their health improvement journey.

title: User Feedback Mechanism for Activities
summary: As a developer, I want to implement a user feedback mechanism for cognitive and physical activities so that I can continuously improve the applications based on user experiences.
